content.text: Hi! I am a recent college graduate and I just got a job as a teacher.
Congratulations! That's so exciting. I'm studying to be a dentist.
What made you want to be a dentist?
I have always loved working with my hands and I am also interested in science. I also enjoy working with people.
That's great! I love working with kids, too. What is your favorite thing about being a student?
I love learning new things and I am also really enjoying my classes. I am learning a lot about dentistry.
I can see why you are enjoying your classes. It sounds really interesting. I am just starting out on my career path and I am excited to see what the future holds.
It is exciting to start a new career. I am sure you will do great things.
You are welcome. I am happy to talk with you. I am always looking for new friends.
Me too. It is nice to meet you.
